netflix.description: Netflix is a streaming service that offers a wide variety of award-winning TV shows, movies, anime, documentaries, and more on thousands of internet-connected devices.You can watch as much as you want, whenever you want. There's always something new to discover and new TV shows and movies are added every week!

disney-plus.description: Disney+ is the dedicated streaming home for movies and shows from Disney, Pixar, Marvel, Star Wars, and National Geographic, along with The Simpsons and much more.

amazon.description: Watch movies, shows, and more on Prime Video Amazon Originals, popular movies, shows, sports, and live TV – it's right here. Prime members can watch even more by subscribing to premium and specialty channels.

telus-tv.description: Demand the best. Watch what you want, when you want. Rent, buy or enjoy free shows and movies On Demand anytime from the comfort of your couch.

basic.plan-description: Some decisions are stressful, but saving 17% off your favourite streaming services is a no brainer. Plus, you can easily transfer over your current streaming subscriptions to Stream+.
